content: 313 sts final slip st itch sequence starting with color 2 work as follows alternating with color 1 every 2 row row 1 color 2 kfb k1 sl1 k1 to marker sm sl1 sm k1 sl1 to last 2 st k1 kfb row 2 color 2 kfb k2 sl1wyif k1 to marker sm sl1wyif sm k1 sl1wyif to last 3 st k2 kfb row 3 color 1 kfb k to st before marker kfb sm k1 sm kfb k to last st kfb row 4 color 1 kfb k to last st kfb row 5 color 2 kfb sl1 k1 to marker sm sl1 sm k1 sl1 to last st kfb row 6 color 2 kfb k1 sl1wyif k1 to 2 st before marker sl1wyif kfb sm sl1wyif sm kfb sl1wyif k1 to last st kfb row 7 color 1 kfb k to last st kfb row 8 color 1 kfb k to last st kfb 333 sts with color 2 work only row 3 and 4 of body pattern once 339 sts bind off as f ollows in color 2 k2 slip both sts back to the left hand needle and k2tog tbl you will now have 1 st on right needle continue to bind off until end as follows k1 slip both sts back to the left hand needle and k2tog tbl cut yarn leaving 10 tail and pull through the remaining st weave in ends block and wear ©2016 darn knit anyway all rights reserved you are allowed to make a copy of this pattern for personal use only in whole or part darnknitanyway com editing and using the pattern as the basis for another pattern or as a template publishing transmitting emailing this pattern to others 6 51 342 1386 or posting online in whole or part is strictly prohibited
